cause.description:
The south shore of massachusetts is trying to raise money to build a play ground with kids of all needs can play. It was started with a boy named Declan who had cerebral palsy when born premature and his family decided something must be done to allow him to have more of a normal life that a 4 year old should have so they started Declans Foundation
1. Position #1
cause.mission: build a playground where kids with all needs can play
cause.name: Declans Foundation-Cerebral Palsy
